extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQ: APSC 171, APSC 172, APSC 174 and registered in BSCE.

basic.description: Review of multiple integrals. Differentiation and integration of vectors; line, surface and volume integrals; gradient, divergence and curl; conservative fields and potential. Spherical and cylindrical coordinates, solid angle. Green's and Stokes' theorems, the divergence theorem.
basic.subject: MTHE
basic.title: Vector Analysis
